content.html: As much as I also want more non-closeted nonbinary and queer rep attention, I truly do balk at the idea that folks have to consistently out themselves for others' comfort. Just a reminder, you never have to express your queerness around the clock, even if you're already out.
content.value:
As much as I also want more non-closeted nonbinary and queer rep attention, I truly do balk at the idea that folks have to consistently out themselves for others' comfort. 

Just a reminder, you never have to express your queerness around the clock, even if you're already out.
